description: A very good digital diary and note taking application if your requirements are not met by Almanah Diary and Gnote.

Either there is no encryption, encryption is broken in Fedora 26 or the encryption option is nested deep somewhere because after 20 minutes I am unable to find anything even mentioning encryption other than that it is a feature in the manual.

I previously left a review saying the application does not encrypt on Fedora 26. It actually does, the option to encrypt a diary is there when you go to make a new diary. Very stable and adheres to GNOME HIG.
I found it easy to setup and use. I like how it keeps my journal private and on my own computer not online.
summary: Easy to use and keeps my journal on my own computer

description: I have been using the excellent Journal It app on my Android device and was looking for an alternative under Linux and found this. Seemed to be the best of all 3 that were available. I am using it but the User Experience is somewhat deficient. Suddenly my entries are no longer listed under the chapter but seem to be there if I use that awkward back button. My Ubuntu is in English but this application is showing some application strings in Spanish (the dates) which is weird.
summary: User Interface needs to be improved

description: Can be used to securely store a variety of text data including journals, manuscripts, passwords, etc.
Excellent program on windows and Linux
summary: Excellent program on windows and Linux

description: This app behaved well for several days then suddenly would not display the most recent entry. The most recent entry is present in the Lifeograph data file when opened with a text editor but the Lifeograph app refuses to display it and will only display the 4 previous entries. This renders the app completely unreliable.
Would be great if latest update 1.6.1-2 was available through Lubuntu
Be careful! Be careful! It is Chinese APP! PRC can screen our data!

Tras probarlo unos segundos veo que:
- no tiene bloqueo por contraseña
- no se puede adjuntar fotos
- no supe cómo eliminar una entrada

Está decente, pero no lo elijo para mi diario.
